name: Sheridan, Appellant, v. Horn & Hardart Baking Co.

parties: Sheridan, Appellant, v. Horn & Hardart Baking Co.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed on the opinion of the learned court below.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Sheridan, Appellant, v. Horn & Hardart Baking Co.
Argued November 13, 1950.
Before Drew, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
Conrad C. Moffett, with him George T. Guarnieri, for appellant.
John J. McDevitt, 3rd, with him Peter P. Liebert, 3rd, for appellee.
January 2, 1951:
